channel.title: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?
channel.description: So im sending some dialogue and i want it to talk about a new tab i added. But i also want to have the tab automatically open when that dialogue is called. I know what to do, i just dont know how to make the tab automatically open. I tried c.setSidebarInterface(6, 24999); and c.showInterface(24999); but neither worked. Anyone have a clue?

item.title: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?
item.dc:creator: @Extrocity Extrocity
item.description:
@Extrocity wrote:

I will give that top link a try, ill post back if i get it working. Hopefully this can help other members.

Read full topic

item.title: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

For non renamed clients:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/346354-non-flashing-sidebar-icons.html
That’s the only one I could find… The only other info I could find was the server sided and someone having the same issue as you.
And no one helped him:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/help/420182-pi-sideicons-not-flashing.html

item.source: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?

item.title: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?
item.dc:creator: @Extrocity Extrocity
item.description:
@Extrocity wrote:

Adding that didn’t work for me. Could it be a problem with packet 24?

here is that packet:

case 24: anInt1054 = inStream.method428(); if (anInt1054 == tabID) { if (anInt1054 == 3) tabID = 1; else tabID = 3; needDrawTabArea = true; } pktType = -1; return true;

EDIT i sort of fixed my problem. I resorted to using packet 106 fro just simply changing the sidebar icon. But i would still like to know how to fix my packet 24! if you search the web many people have this problem but havent found a solution. Im thinking it could possibly be because of a different gameframe.

Read full topic
item.source: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?

item.title: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Extrocity:

do i just use c.getPA().flashSideIcon(6); ? or do i have to add more then just that.

Yeah, that’s it.
It should already be in the client.

Read full topic

item.source: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?

item.title: Automatically open a tab when dialogue is sent?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

showInterface(int) would only show an interface in the game window.
Make sure you have this (and use it…)

/* * Flashes the sideicon */ public void flashSideIcon(int i) { if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null ) { c.getOutStream().createFrame(24); c.getOutStream().writeByteA(i); c.flushOutStream(); } }

Read full topic
